title: (x) Wide bold slab serif "accessories" - Linotype Egyptian {Akira}
content:
hey everyone.

does anybody happen to know what typeface this is?

i really enjoy the fatness, alot like Cooper, but this one has slabs.

any help would be great.

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121221911im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/header-accessories_6299.gif)

 [‹ Axel Rudi Pell faux-Asian display font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121221911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37378 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Knights Live mediaeval ornate serif - Valdemar {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121221911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37237 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jmcalo1
